articles.title: Pope Francis has a birthday. He is 85 years old

articles.title: Tennis-Del Potro eyeing February comeback at Argentina Open
articles.description:
Juan Martin Del Potro said he hopes to return to the ATP Tour in February at the Argentina Open in Buenos Aires after being sidelined for over two years with knee injuries.
It would be very special to come back in Buenos Aires and then play in Rio," Del Potro, 33, wrote on Instagram https://www.instagram.com/p/CXjSVqCLK2f.
articles.content: Juan Martin Del Potro said he hopes to return to the ATP Tour in February at the Argentina Open in Buenos Aires after being sidelined for over two years with knee injuries. The 2009 U.S. Open champion last competed in mid-2019 and has undergone four ... [442 chars]

articles.title: Argentina farm belt set for high temperatures, then rain - exchange
articles.description: By Maximilian HeathBUENOS AIRES, Dec 16 (Reuters) - Argentina's central farm belt is set for very high temperatures in the coming days, followed by moderate to heavy rains, the Buenos Aires grains exchange said on Thursday, after it warned recently about the impact of expected dry weather on production.The South American nation is the world's leading exporter of processed soy

articles.title: Argentina economy seen expanding 12% in Q3 on energy, farming growth
articles.description: "The two sectors are key to getting the foreign exchange Argentina needs in the short and medium term." The South American nation, which posted a 17.9% GDP rise in the second quarter, is expected to report the third quarter figure later on Thursday.
articles.content:
Argentina's Gross Domestic Product (GDP) likely expanded 12% year-on-year in the third quarter of 2021, according to the median estimate from a Reuters poll of analysts, rebounding sharply after a 10.2% slump in the same period last year.

articles.description: Pep Guardiola compared Sergio Aguero to Argentina greats Diego Maradona and Lionel Messi after the Barcelona striker announced his retirement.

articles.title: Lionel Messi shares emotional message on Sergio Aguero's retirement
articles.description: Messi posted a picture of himself hugging Sergio Aguero on his Instagram as he bade adieu to Aguero as the Argentina and Barcelona striker Sergio Aguero took an abrupt retirement from football at the age of 33 after being diagnosed with a heart ailment.

articles.title: YEARENDER-Sport-'Wow' moments from the sporting year
articles.description: Messi was playing for Argentina when Brazilian health inspectors rushed onto the field in the middle of the biggest soccer game in South America, suspending the World Cup qualifier over a COVID-19 quarantine breach by some players. Athlete struggles with mental health also opened an important discussion.
articles.content:
Sport provided a massive adrenaline rush in 2021 with incredible stories to savour in an intense and often overwhelming year.
There were highs and lows, and moments of raw emotion when athletes pushed the limits and revealed their human vulnerabiliti... [3533 chars]

articles.title: Sergio Aguero: Former Manchester City striker in tears as he retires from football
articles.description: Aguero made his professional debut aged 15 in Argentina before going on to play over 600 times for clubs in Spain and England.
articles.content:
A tearful Sergio Aguero announced his retirement from football, aged 33, due to a heart condition.
The Manchester City record goalscorer, who joined Barcelona in the summer, was forced off during the Catalan side's 1-1 draw with Alaves in October aft... [2207 chars]

articles.title: London to host Italy-Argentina champions clash
articles.description: LONDON: London will host the first edition of a new intercontinental final between the champions of Europe and South America when Italy face Argentina on June 1, UEFA said on Wednesday.
articles.content:
London to host Italy-Argentina champions clash
